data.name: Quizee - Games for Parties and Twitch! Demo
data.detailed_description:
The demo contains 2 game modes and around 150 questions.

The quiz mode allows for a streamer to play against their Twitch chat, or for players to play locally against each other with a keyboard player and others using gamepads. There are approximately 150 questions in his mode right now, which may be updated with more as time progresses.

The Do You Know? Mode currently only supports a streamer playing with Twitch chat, trying to guess what the majority of the chat voted for. There are 50 questions in this mode.

A quiz creator is included, allowing players to create their own quizzes. You can link to the quizzes in the games forum if you wish. You can also state if you would be happy to have the quiz included in the main game, after the quiz has been vetted by the developer.

data.short_description: Demo for Quizee, containing 2 game modes and approximately 150 questions. Allows streamers to play with their Twitch chat, and for local players to use gamepads to play the quiz mode against each other.

fullgame.name: Quizee - Games for Parties and Twitch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 620 / Nvidia GT 740 / AMD R7 250 or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Display with a resolution of 1280x720 or higher is required.

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
